item.title: Chord Dialer
item.description: A printable, craftable chord-dialer, which uses the properties of the dozen to identify major and minor chords by both dozenal number and by traditional music notes (A, B, etc.).

item.title: Updated Newscast Page
item.description: Issues 08:01 and 08:02 of the Newscast are now online.

item.title: Trigons to Triads: A Play on Chords
item.description: We're proud to publish this piece by Donald Hammond, which explains triangles, Pythagorean triples, and the relationship of these to musical notes, such that they can create a chord-dialer to select appropriate notes for major and minor chords.
